title: POST Create Meeting
description: Create a new meeting in HubSpot and log the operation to the database

session_id.description: Chat session ID for logging purposes

chat_message_id.description: Chat message ID that triggered this action

associations.description: Associations to create with the meeting

contacts.description: Contact IDs to associate with the meeting

companies.description: Company IDs to associate with the meeting

deals.description: Deal IDs to associate with the meeting

properties.hs_meeting_body: Discussion about Q1 goals and objectives

tips: Always include session_id and chat_message_id for proper logging
hs_meeting_title is typically required for HubSpot meetings
Use Unix timestamps for start_time and end_time (milliseconds since epoch)
Set appropriate meeting outcomes: SCHEDULED, COMPLETED, CANCELLED, etc.
Associate meetings with contacts, companies, or deals for better tracking
Include meeting body/agenda for context and follow-up
The operation is automatically logged to the database with sync status

basic_meeting.curl: curl -X POST 'http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/hubspot/activities/meetings' -H 'Authorization: Bearer {token}' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"session_id": 1, "chat_message_id": 5, "properties": {"hs_meeting_title": "Client Meeting", "hs_meeting_body": "Discussion about project requirements"}}'

scheduled_meeting.description: Create a scheduled meeting with associations
scheduled_meeting.curl: curl -X POST 'http://127.0.0.1:5000/api/hubspot/activities/meetings' -H 'Authorization: Bearer {token}' -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d '{"session_id": 1, "chat_message_id": 5, "properties": {"hs_meeting_title": "Q1 Planning Meeting", "hs_meeting_start_time": 1705312800000, "hs_meeting_end_time": 1705316400000, "hs_meeting_outcome": "SCHEDULED"}, "associations": {"contacts": ["12345"], "companies": ["67890"]}}'
